name: Dethrone
description:
Dive deep into the dark times when the sword and magic shared justice. Enter into the boots of a young warrior who set out on an epic quest. Overcame horror of the Black Tower, dethrone Black Dragon lord and avenge your father. Retrace story full of twists and dark characters interspersed with intense action, all in this 3D horror-shooter... Can you reach the throne room?

Features:

* Intense shooting action that will require a precision, skill and composure

* Dark labyrinths through the mystical fortress that will test your memory

* Upgrade system that will allow you to improve your hero in your own way

* Epic story of an ancient warrior and his dark adventures

* Highscore board that allows you to compete with your friends.

System requirements:

Windows Xp/Vista/7/8

Graphic card 256Mb

Dual Core processor 2.0

1Gb Ram

250Mb Hard Disc free

Mouse + Keyboard
